text:
PHILIP MORRIS
ASIA
REGIONAL BULLETIN
Mr .
Joseph   Tcheng,
Vice   President;
Philip
Morris   Asia,
wishes
to
announce
the
following
changes
in
the
Taiwan
market
effective
November
1999.
Mr, Goddard Kwong is appointed National Sales Manager, reporting to
Mr_
Anthony Lau, General Manager
Taiwan:
Goddard
is
3 seasoned
sales professiona
who has extensive experience in the markets 0f PRC
Hong Kong and Taiwan.
He joined Philip Morris in 1973 and has held
variety of responsible positions, including General Manager for the PRC
and
most recently
Director of Sales Development for
Greater
China_
Goddard and
family will relocate t0 Taipei_
Mr _
Karl Hsu; who is currently Sales & Planning Manager, has choscn
to leave Philip Morris in order to pursue other career opportunities.
Karl
joined   Philip
Morris
Taiwan
in
1989
and
has
played
key
role
In
managing the finance and administration functions before taking up his
current position in {996.
Most recently Karl was
key member of
a task
force team that completed a smooth transition of the sales force irom
Tait to McClane, our new distributor
Please wish Goddard success in his new appointment; and thank Karl
for his contributions to Philip Morris Taiwan
Vice ?eesideni; 
Jelir,phyman Resources
1
November
1999
